snippet: Over a dozen tornadoes were reported throughout the Midwest on Wednesday as thunderstorms battered the region and barreled toward the Atlantic Coast overnight.
abstract: Enormous string of thunderstorms whips through Upper Midwest and barrels toward Atlantic Coast, blanketing vast swath of country with high winds, large hail and rain; more than a dozen tornadoes are reported throughout Midwest, from Iowa to Indiana.
lead_paragraph: Over a dozen tornadoes were reported throughout the Midwest on Wednesday as thunderstorms battered the region and barreled toward the Atlantic Coast overnight.

headline.main: Band of Heavy Weather Ravages Midwest
headline.print_headline: Band of Heavy Weather Ravages Midwest on Way to Mid-Atlantic
